question: Who has been appointed as new CMD of India Tourism Development Corporation (ITDC)?
explanation: G Kamala Vardhana Rao,  an IAS officer 1990 batch from Kerala Cadre, has been appointed as new CMD of India Tourism Development Corporation (ITDC).The ITDC is a hospitality, retail and education company owned by Government of India, under Ministry of Tourism. It came into existence in October 1966 and owns over 17 properties under the Ashok Group of Hotels brand across India.
